CustomField.description: Displays the Supplier Name related to the SOP SupplierID.
CustomField.formula:
CASE( SupplierID__c , "1", "CREATIVE HIRE", "4", "SUB HIRE XACT", "5", "JMT FURNITURE", "6", "MESSE FRANKFURT", "7", "HESTA STANDFITTING", "8", "Van der Veen Electrics", "9", "JMT FLOORCOVERING", "10", "MESSE WAW", "11", "ANTONIO DAM", "12", "Frank De Dijk", "13", "RESOURCE CREATIVE", "14", "test", "15", "HAPECO FURNITURE", "16", "FLSP 4 for Everything", "17", "Operations", "18", "Aztec", "19", "Provision", "20", "JMT+VDV", "21", "EAS - Standfitting", "22", "EAS - Floorcovering", "23", "EAS - Electrics", "26", "EAS - Furniture", "27", " Nameboard", "28", "Blitz AV", "29", "N200 / Ops", "30", "Event Assistant / Sommer Event Flooring", "32", "De Roeve Lighting", "33", "JMT Furniture & VdV (Showcases)", "34", "Hapeco & VdV (Showcases)",
"NA")
CustomField.inlineHelpText: Displays the Supplier Name related to the SOP SupplierID.
CustomField.label: SOP Supplier Name
